overview: Actress Bipasha Basu has got a body to die for and she doesn't mind flaunting it! She let out the big secret behind her killer curves as Bipasha launched a new fitness DVD.  In the latest DVD - titled as Break Free - the sultry actress is seen reinventing all her famous moves for her fans and the fitness fanatics.Break Free promises fitness freaks a fabulous body like Bipasha
title: Break Free Bipasha Basu
